title: Six Different Phil. Athletics Real Photo Postcards Burke Negatives

posts.post_title: Six Different Phil. Athletics Real Photo Postcards Burke Negatives
posts.post_content:
Lot of Six Different Phil. Athletics Real Photo Postcards produced C1980 from original George Burke negatives, includes two different Jimmie Foxx, Max Bishop, Lamar Newsom, Bill Nicholson & George Puccinelli - on ebay
Check/MO or Paypal Friend.  Thank you.  Jim
